text:
Today I'm getting an error in the serverless functions I was playing with: "this account is not authorized for public content or serverless functions". Wasn't getting this yesterday.
I've also been having trouble with the CLI tools this morning. Could that be related?
Likely related to the other issue you mentioned
If there is a bug with the personal access token, the BE can’t tell if you have you access to serverless functions

Hello HubSpoters !
I'm trying to play around with the serverless functions.
When I try to upload a a folder container my "file-name.functions" I get this error :  Folder name cannot end with .functions
Any idea ?

Hi I'm testing CLI and serverless function connecting to a brand new dev account with Marketing Hub Enterprise but I get this error
```$ hs --portal=p-test upload serverless-tutorial/my-first-function.functions serverless-tutorial
Uploading files from serverless-tutorial/my-first-function.functions to serverless-tutorial in portal ********
Uploaded file "....\serverless-tutorial\my-first-function.functions\my-first-function.js" to "serverless-tutorial/my-first-function.js"
[ERROR] Uploading file "....\serverless-tutorial\my-first-function.functions\serverless.json" to "serverless-tutorial/serverless.json" failed
[ERROR] This portal does not have access to serverless functions```
You need to have CMS enterprise, dev portals dont seem to be working. Had the same issue yesterday
This is a serverless function that's already up in the portal and was working yesterday, not one I'm trying to push now, if that makes a difference

For both issues the problem is that this portal lost access to serverless functions. If you tried to get a new personal access key you wouldn't be able to select serverless. We are looking into why that happened and trying to fix.

Hi there <@U011EU8R5S6> it appears you’re not using a portal with CMS Hub. CMS Hub enterprise is separate from marketing Hub Enterprise.

If you’re looking to learn  serverless functions you can do so using a cms developer sandbox account <https://offers.HubSpot.com/free-cms-developer-sandbox>
